mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party (id, party_regdate, party_service, party_subservice, party_title, party_member, party_id, party_pw, party_tel, party_start, party_end, party_charge, party_adult, party_notice, party_available) VALUES ( #{id}, NOW(), #{party_service}, #{party_subservice}, #{party_title}, #{party_member}, #{party_id}, #{party_pw}, #{party_tel}, #{party_start}, #{party_end}, #{party_charge}, #{party_adult}, #{party_notice}, #{party_available})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num;

SELECT a.*, b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num ORDER BY a.party_num DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT b.nick, b.mycharge, b.mystartday, a.party_num, a.party_service, a.party_subservice, a.party_title, a.party_charge, a.party_available, a.party_end FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN party_member b ON a.party_num = b.party_num WHERE b.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mystartday DESC;
SELECT * FROM party_bill WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY bill_date DESC

SELECT a.*, b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT party.* , member.nick, member.profile FROM party JOIN member ON party.id = member.id WHERE party_num=#{party_num}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num
SELECT id, nick, DATE_FORMAT(mystartday, '%Y.%m.%d') AS mystartday FROM party_member WHERE party_num=#{party_num}

SELECT no_cmnt, party_num, id, nick, comment, comment_private, comment_date, comment_to_nick, DATE_FORMAT(comment_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS comment_date FROM party_comment WHERE party_num = #{party_num} ORDER BY no_cmnt DESC;
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(b.mycharge),0) AS sum FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN party_member b ON a.party_num = b.party_num WHERE b.id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY b.mystartday DESC

SELECT a.party_charge* DATEDIFF(a.party_end, NOW()) * b.party_count AS party_now_member FROM (SELECT * FROM party WHERE id=#{id}) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT party_num, count(*) AS party_count FROM party_member GROUP BY party_num) b ON a.party_num = b.party_num WHERE a.party_end >= NOW() AND b.party_count IS NOT NULL
SELECT no_cmnt FROM party_comment WHERE party_num=#{party_num} AND id=#{id} ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO party_comment (party_num, id, nick, comment, comment_private, comment_date, comment_to_nick) VALUES(#{party_num}, #{id}, #{nick}, #{comment}, #{comment_private}, #{comment_date}, #{comment_to_nick})
INSERT INTO party_bill (id, bill_date, bill_charge, bill_pay) VALUES(#{id}, NOW(), #{bill_charge}, #{bill_pay})
mapper.update: UPDATE party SET party_available = '0' WHERE party_num = #{party_num}
UPDATE party SET party_title=#{party_title}, party_id=#{party_id}, party_pw=#{party_pw}, party_tel=#{party_tel}, party_notice=#{party_notice} WHERE party_num=#{party_num}
